mean_cn: adj. 外科的，手术上的；  n. 外科手术，外科病房
mean_en: of or relating to the process of performing a medical operation :of or relating to surgery
word_etyma: surg外科的  +  ical形容词后缀 → surgical 外科的
short_phrase: wear surgical masks in the hospital
sentence: Our surgical masks and caps protect the patient from infection during surgery.
